body:
Hello my avicus friends.

I am looking for a compact, red backlit keyboard. I am also looking for a mechanical switches mainly for gaming. It would be amazing since I broke my other board broke...

Price : Atleast 50 -60


Thank you!

title: Mechanical Keyboard Help
